name: The_World_According_to_Garp
text:
The World According to Garp
The World According to Garp was a book by John Irving.
A favorite of Andy Brennan, a copy of the book was kept at the Bookhouse.
Behind the scenes
The World According to Garp is a 1978 novel by John Irving.
The 1982 film adaptation features Peter Michael Goetz.
